title: LEE SIN IS NOT STRONG ANYMORE

embed.description: hey guys it is me cameron vcotiecaminatepie and i would just like to let u know that htis play this game lcip right here is complete bonkers idk how the hell this guy does it the continuously does insane baits and outplays like this it is just beyond me at

body:
Pls guys i would really appreciate if you guys dont play Lee Sin anymore in Rankeds. This Champ is garbage and nothing more.

Thanks O.o
